MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre-arranged work affecting your property in the CH2 postcode area of Chester is still ongoing. This is due to ground conditions on site and we now expect power to be back on by 5pm.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:15pm on 11th November 2020.
